pr_title: Remove analytics that are no longer actionable

timeline.message: Add analytics for submissions to custom endpoint

timeline.bodyText: Yay for delegate tests! I think here I'd personally split the tests so that each "then" of a "given"/"when" gets its own test. Can just make it easier to navigate the assertions and change individual features. The trade off is run time of course but these tests are pretty fast once Robolectric has booted up (which is a small cost when you're running everything).
timeline.author: seadowg

timeline.message: Remove analytics events that aren't actionable
Add separate analytics for different settings import paths
Add analytics for submissions to custom endpoint
